definitions.description: A mental health disorder characterised by persistently depressed mood or loss of interest in activities, causing significant impairment in daily life.
definitions.Help: People with depression may not recognize or acknowledge that they're depressed. They may not be aware of signs and symptoms of depression, so they may think their feelings are normal. All too often, people feel ashamed about their depression and mistakenly believe they should be able to overcome it with willpower alone. But depression seldom gets better without treatment and may get worse. With the right treatment approach, the person you care about can get better.Suggest seeking help from a professional
